name: The Princess
description:
Poised, prepared, and drastically in over their head. The Princess is about knowing what is expected of you in life and trying to live up to those expectations that seem insurmountable. While a normal teenager might have problems such as making the highest SAT score or grabbing a scholarship the Princess is burdened with the weights only a fantastical protagonist should have.

The Princess is a Skin for Monsterhearts 2 based on the kids who have uncomfortable and/or unfair expectations upon their shoulders. Tinted in the lens of Urban Fantasy these expectations turn into world shaking events that may leave the towns these teens reside in changed forever.

Flavored in the new genre of redemptive heroes and heroines such as Steven Universe and She-Ra and the Princesses of Power this Skin gives you tools to bring such themes to your table.
